snippet.title: Police urge Kambah Pool theft witness to come forward
snippet.content: Thieves broke into a car at Kambah pool before driving off in a stolen grey BMW linked to a string of Canberra burglaries and firearm offences. At 12:00pm on Thursday, July 6, the owner of the car returned to find his vehicle broken in to, with a witness saying they saw two men around the car.Photo: Supplied Police urged this witness to come forward as they would be able to describe the alleged offenders. The stolen grey BMW 523i is linked to a number of serious offences in Canberra, police said. Anyone who had any information that could assist police were urged to contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or via the .
